station.name: Sports Flashes
station.longDesc: Sportsflashes is not just another sports content company, it is a thought, a vision that aims to create a democratic sporting environment that can reach all regions of this country and entertain its followers. When we say, EVERYTHING ABOUT SPORTS, we stand for every possible meaning that it holds. We are the voice that will usher the new era of sports in this country. We are the disruptors that will push every sport to the forefront and we believe this can come true through the marriage of entertainment and sports. By catering to different languages, we are bringing sports fans across the nation to come together and enjoy the world of sports under the same umbrella. Sportsflashes finds its DNA in the antics, rituals and passion of every sports lover in this country. A journey that started in August 2016, we have been able to make IndiaТs fastest growing Multi Sports, Multi-languages content platform (digital). Available in 7 languages, we serve more than 5 million viewers with Scores, Live Streaming, News, Videos, Updates and more from the world of Sports. Sports Flashes is perhaps the only independent media venture in India (Times Group invested company) which provides multi-sports, multi-lingual content on a single platform. Recently we launched the 1st& only 24x7 Sports Radio Channel (Digital) of India.
